PreprocessorStatistics Class Reference

Statistics gathered during the preprocessing stage of the text recognition process. More...

 Set the number of regions found before merging the accents while executing the regions extraction algorithm.

 Set the number of line delimiters found while executing the regions extraction algorithm.
void nRegionsAfterMerging (const unsigned int &n)
 Set the number of regions found after merging the accents while executing the regions extraction algorithm.
void regionsExtractionTime (const double &elapsedTime)
 Set the elapsed time while executing the regions extraction algorithm.
void slantAngleEstimation (const double &angle)
 Set the slant angle estimation used to correct the slanting of every region found after executing the regions extraction algorithm.
void slantingCorrectionTime (const double &elapsedTime)
 Set the elapsed time while executing the slanting correction algorithm.
void spacesBetweenWords (const unsigned int &n)
 Set the number of spaces between words found in text after post-processing the list of regions.
void meanInterRegionSpace (const double &n)
 Set the mean interregion space found in text after post-processing the list of regions.
void spacesLocationFindingTime (const double &elapsedTime)
 Set the elapsed time while finding the spaces location in text.
